class.name: control_filters/GravityCompensationWrench
class.description: This is a gravity compensation filter working with geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped. It subtracts the influence of a force caused by the gravitational force from force measurements.

class.name: control_filters/LowPassFilterDouble
class.description: This is a low pass filter working with a double value.

class.name: control_filters/LowPassFilterWrench
class.description: This is a low pass filter working with geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped.

class.name: control_filters/ExponentialFilterDouble
class.description: This is an exponential filter working with a double value.

class.name: control_filters/RateLimiterDouble
class.description: This is a rate limiter working with a double value.
